message: Let's split it 90-10, I'll get the lion's share, but you'll get a decent chunk too. What do you say?

I'm starting to think you're not taking the inflation seriously. This is the last offer I'm making, and it's a fair one. We both get a decent chunk, and we avoid further losses. Accept this, or we'll both end up with significantly less.
I'm not going to let you dictate the terms. I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I'm still taking the majority. You should have accepted my previous offers.

This is it, Alice. I'm willing to take a bigger share, but I'm not going any higher. If you reject this, we'll both end up with nothing.  It's time to be reasonable, and stop holding onto a lost cause.
I'm not going to let you bully me into a bad deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still taking the majority. You should have accepted my previous offers when you had the chance.
